tasks.label: üîç Analyze TypeScript Files
args: Get-ChildItem -Path ${workspaceFolder}/src -Recurse -Filter *.ts | Select-Object FullName, Length, LastWriteTime | Format-Table -AutoSize

tasks.label: üìã List Features
args: Get-ChildItem -Path ${workspaceFolder}/src/features -Directory | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "Feature: $($_.Name)"; Get-ChildItem -Path $_.FullName -Recurse -Filter *.ts | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "  TypeScript files: $_" } }
